column1: Little Goat Diner////Came here for breakfast while visiting in Chicago. Every employee we encountered was super nice and helpful
column2: and even gave us other Chicago recommendations. The corned beef and hash was good
column3: and not pictured are the biscuits and gravy. They were mostly flavorless which is kind of a bummer because it's a more expensive spot to eat. Other than that it's a really beautiful environment and nicely decorated.
